Quote: You should have a map with you.  The map will show all the residential building and information about them.
Scroll over a house in order to interact with it.
Before you enter it is safest to inspect that way there are no surprises. Just do not overexert yourself.
You are gonna need to head inside if you want to help anyone.
Use Enter to enter a house.
Make sure to take enough supplies with you in the house.
Use the + and - buttons to increase and decrease supplies.
